title: Evaluating Machine Learning Model Quality
description: In machine learning, it is important to evaluate the quality of the predictions made by a model. This helps us understand how well the model is performing and whether it can be trusted for making accurate predictions. The scikit-learn library provides several metrics and scoring methods to quantify the quality of predictions.

meta.title: Evaluating Machine Learning Model Quality
meta.description: Explore the scikit-learn APIs for quantifying the performance of machine learning models.
meta.keywords: machine learning, cross validation, scikit learn, model evaluation, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, prediction quality
